actions.message:
Hello!
 
I see you have a problem, but I need more information to help you.
 
Type `;1` for LSPDFR support
Type `;2` for RagePluginHook support.
Type `;3` if you need help with installing scripts.
Type `;4` if you can't connect to Rockstar game servers.
Type `;5` if I didn't solve your problem.
Type `;bot` for more information about this bot.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
I see you have problem with LSPDFR, but I need more information.
If your LSPDFR is crashing, type `;lspdfr1`
If your plugins are not working, type `;lspdfr2`
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
I now know what the problem is.
 
To fix LSPDFR crashing, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Reinstall all plugins and make a clean install of LSPDFR 0.4.
2. If your LSPDFR freezes or crashes in the game, press `F4` to open console and type `reloadallplugins`. This may take a while but your plugins will work again.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
To fix this issue, follow these steps:
 
1.Reinstall the plugin that is not working, but be careful when you install plugin. Search for the latest plugin, or install a plugin for LSPDFR 0.4 version, not for 0.3.
2.Download Albo Trouble-shooter. When you download it, press start and it will check for any errors in plugins. If you have any errors in any plugins, use automatic fix or go for the manual fix.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
I see that you have a problem with RagePluginHook, but I need more information to help you.

If RPH is crashing, type `;rph1`.
If RPH is not loading, type `;rph2`.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
To fix this, follow these steps:
1. Delete your mods folder and then try to play GTA V.
2. Make a clean installation of RPH, because RPH is updated every 5-6 months and you may be using an outdated version.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Your RPH will not load.. that’s not good! To fix the problem, follow these steps:
 
1. Launch your GTA V first, and when the game loads, hold/press `ALT+TAB`. Then click on RPH to load, the game will freeze for a couple of seconds and then RPH will fully load
2. If that doesn't work, right click on `RagePluginHook.exe` and click `Launch as administrator`.
3. Launch RPH. When you launch it, press the settings button. After, go to game settings or advance settings and search for `Force Windowed Mode`. When you find it, click on the unchecked box and then press save and launch.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
So you want to install some scripts, that is easy, follow my steps. :D
1. Go to your GTA V main directory and make a folder called `scripts`.
2. Go to google and download `Script Hook V`, `ScriptHookV.net` and `NativeUI`.
3. Drag and drop `Script Hook V` and `ScriptHookV.net` files into your GTA V directory.
4. Drag and drop `NativeUI` files into your scripts folder.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
You can't connect to Rockstar servers? Ok, that is a simple problem, so follow my steps to try and fix it:
 
1. Search **Rockstar Servers Status**, click on the first link and you will see Rockstar server status. Green means good, yellow means you may have some issues, and red means the servers are down)
2. If you have the steam version of GTA V, then you will need to right click on GTA V in your game library, then click properties > local files, and verify the integrity of game files. When you click on it, Steam will automatically check for GTA 5 updates and issues with your game.
3. If you have the non-steam version of GTA V, then go to the Rockstar Games website and log in, go to game downloads, click on GTA V and click on download tool. When you download the tool, open it and press repair GTA V.
actions.name: Send Message
